title: The use  of battery
answer:
1) The Cordless Phone battery is able to support 150mins talking time or 150 hours stand-by time (reference value, the actual time is according to the condition of GSM network) in case of no external power supply.
2) The battery is in packing box, and before using the Cordless Phone, the user needs to install the battery correctly. During the installation of battery, you need to take care of the direction of the socket, and try to avoid the reverse installation.
3) Cordless Phone will charge the battery automatically when using the charger stand connected with external power. And it will stop automatically when the charging process is completed (the battery will still be charged, when the power switch is off.).
